previewArticle.title: Italy vs. Uruguay: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Italy 0, Uruguay 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Egidio Arévalo Rios (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mario Balotelli (Italy).

timelineItems.name: Erica
timelineItems.text: Jealous that my dad gets to watch this #ITAvURU match while in Italy. Praying he enjoys the experience. And doesn't shoot his mouth off.

timelineItems.name: Jackson Butler
timelineItems.text: I don't know how Suarez is going to go without Gerard. He set up all his goals v England. Had a great partnership. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.comment: Marco Verratti (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Martín Cáceres (Uruguay).

timelineItems.text: it'll be much more fun watching #ITAvURU someone's gotta share our cab to the airport

timelineItems.name: Iris

timelineItems.desc:
Re-live the best (and worst) moments of Italy vs. Uruguay Group D match in Natal, Brazil.

Catch all MLSsoccer.com's World Cup coverage at www.mlssoccer.com/worldcup
timelineItems.title: World Cup in Pictures: Uruguay advance, but victory marred by another Luis Suarez bite

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece scores its 3rd-ever #WorldCup goal in 9 games. 1st time Greece has scored first in a WC game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Colombia's 43-year-old keeper Faryd Mondragón enters the game. He's the oldest player in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece advances to its first #WorldCup knockout round on a stoppage-time penalty. Opa.

timelineItems.name: Krishnan
timelineItems.text: One more defensive midfielder. Just because Italy can. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Uruguay) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristian Rodríguez.
Foul by Mattia De Sciglio (Italy).
Maxi Pereira (Uruguay) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Damian
timelineItems.text: This is where the Italians show the rest of the world how to defend to close out a match #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Susanna Fantoni
timelineItems.text: Looks as though #Italy just lost their 4th man! This is the type of excitement I really don't like! #ITAvURU #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Suárez (Uruguay).
Giorgio Chiellini (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Giorgio Chiellini (Italy) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Álvaro González (Uruguay) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: Pereira still looks dazed! #concussion #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: FCB News&Negativity
timelineItems.text: Lots of football in this wrestling match. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Corner,  Uruguay. Conceded by Mattia De Sciglio.

timelineItems.name: Erik Pitzer
timelineItems.text: Chomp. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL: #URU scores with 10 minutes to go, will go through if score holds. http://t.co/Y51YQgfSlr #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Greg Frankson
timelineItems.text: Wow. What the hell is happening? That was the most appalling sequence of football I've seen in a long, long time. #ItavUru #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: George Nimeh  ✨
timelineItems.text: Review it. And then toss him out of the tournament. "@soccergods: Chomp chomp, Mr. Suarez. #ITAvURU https://t.co/CUGkDGZJX4"

timelineItems.name: Todd Baker
timelineItems.text: Surely Suarez doesn't play in the next round?? #ITAvURU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gastón Ramírez (Uruguay).
Andrea Pirlo (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: bilaltaufiq
timelineItems.text: Cheating at its peak #itavuru #ref #mexican.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrea Pirlo (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Walker
timelineItems.text: Suarez used Bite on Chiellini and then Godin used Headbutt on that ball to score and that combo was super effective #ITAvURU #ITA #URU

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Italy. Conceded by Christian Stuani.

timelineItems.name: Tony Rubio
timelineItems.text: This game is getting entertaining�� #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Andrew Thompson
timelineItems.text: Suarez up to his old tricks again, for such a great player, he has so many moments of insanity #ITAvURU WorldCup2014 #Gnasher

timelineItems.name: Dave Meldrum
timelineItems.text: say what you like about suarez, but he brings people together. in hatred. #itavuru #worldcup

timelineItems.name: JavierC. Corleone
timelineItems.text: #ITAvURU this is getting hot... Too much fouls starting the game.

timelineItems.comment: Andrea Pirlo (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Uruguay).

timelineItems.name: Juice-tan
timelineItems.text: I get the sense there is a lot of chirping going on, on the pitch. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Ci_co
timelineItems.text: Uruguay and #Suarez really vamping up the heat here #ITAVURU https://t.co/jBc7tk2xCX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrea Barzagli (Italy).
Gastón Ramírez (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Yurachek & Assoc.
timelineItems.text: What a terribly unhygenic way to win. #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Paisley Park
timelineItems.text: And to make it worse, uruguay score straight after. Injustice. Suarez the rat should be banned from the tourno #ITAvURU

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica wins Group D, the only group in #WorldCup history with three World Cup-winning countries.

timelineItems.name: Barry Mercer
timelineItems.text: I suppose if you have a set of choppers like that you might as well use them as often as possible. #Suarez #ITAvURU

timelineItems.comment: Andrea Pirlo (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Álvaro González (Uruguay).
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Uruguay) right footed shot from more than 40 yards on the right wing misses to the right. Assisted by Álvaro González with a headed pass.
Foul by Christian Stuani (Uruguay).
Thiago Motta (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Kellin Patler
timelineItems.text: Waiting for a fight to break out. #itavuru

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Italy 0, Uruguay 1.
